result.arabic_text: سَلۡ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ كَمۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰهُم مِّنۡ ءَايَةِۭ بَيِّنَةٖۗ وَمَن يُبَدِّلۡ نِعۡمَةَ ٱللَّهِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ مَا جَآءَتۡهُ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ
result.translation: 211. Nabiyow israa-iil xayloh cirdeynaani esser, ken kitaabal Baxxaqqa itta Astootik ma- kina Asta keenih necee cakki fan tirri ken hayta Astootiy elle koroositeenik, Yallih Niqmat (Yallih diini kinnuk) kaah yemeeteeh kaa yeexegeek lakal kaa yibiddileeh elle koroositah yan num, Toysa Diggah Yalli kaxxa digaala kaah-le.
